Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2007 01:55AM teejay wrote: Stress? It can't do a bc body good, but it's hard not to be stressed when the dx alone is so life-changing. Add to that the little everyday challenges, like when your husband writes to you and says, "What's your prognosis? If you are going to die in the next year, I want to make things as easy as possible. But if you're going to live longer than that, I'm going to file for divorce." I gotcha stress!
Posts.Title: stress and breast cancer shastaw Mizsissy
